ing: 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (11 ounce) can mandarin orange sections, drained
des: "Ambrosia Pudding is a speedy and special way to round out this menu. ' Serving this in a parfait glass showcases the layers,' noted Debbie Jones of California, Maryland."
ins: In a bowl, blend pudding and milk according to package directions. Add honey, orange peel and vanilla. Fold in the whipped cream. In individual dessert dishes, layer half of the pudding, banana slices, orange sections, coconut and almonds. Repeat the layers. Chill.
